it.polimi.se2018.network

Interface ServerInterface

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.rmi.Remote
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Server

    public interface ServerInterface
extends java.rmi.Remote
    An interface to expose Server's methods to allow RMI clients to connect

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean connectRMIClient(RemoteProxyRMIInterface remoteProxyRMI, java.lang.String player)
      A method that must be called from a remote client via RMI.

    • Method Detail

      • connectRMIClient

        boolean connectRMIClient(RemoteProxyRMIInterface remoteProxyRMI,
                         java.lang.String player)
                  throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        A method that must be called from a remote client via RMI. Tries to connect the client with this server
        Parameters:
        remoteProxyRMI - the server's representation on client side
        player - the nickname of the player
        Returns:
        true if the connection is successful, false otherwise
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - if there is a communication error
